metadata.title: CVE-2024-35922 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: fbmon:prevent division by zero in fb_videomode_from_videomode() The expressionhtotal * vtotal can have a zero value on overflow. It is necessary toprevent division by zero like in fb_var_to_videomode(). Found by LinuxVerification Center (linuxtesting.org) with Svace.
